content:
<table-wrap id="tbl1" position="float">
<label>1</label>
<caption>
<title>Amount of CO<sub>2</sub> Adsorbed Per Mass of MOF
(Average ± Standard Deviation) at 303 K (CO<sub>2</sub> Pressure
100 kPa) Calculated Using Resonant Frequency Change in Drop-Cast and
LB Samples</title>
</caption>
<oasis:table colsep="0" rowsep="0">
<oasis:tgroup cols="3">
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col1"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="." colname="col2"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="±" colname="col3"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:thead>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry align="center">sample</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">average MOF mass (μg)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">CO<sub>2</sub> adsorption (mmol of CO<sub>2</sub>/g of MOF)</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:thead>
<oasis:tbody>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Cast-film (MOF)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>5.6</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>1.58 ± 0.01</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Cast-film (MOF + 1% BA)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>5.4</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.94 ± 0.01</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>LB film (MOF + 1% BA, 2 layers)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.3</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.94 ± 0.02</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>LB film (MOF + 1% BA, 1 layer)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>1.2</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.90 ± 0.05</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:tbody>
</oasis:tgroup>
</oasis:table>
</table-wrap>
clean_text:
Table 1. Amount of CO<sub>2</sub> Adsorbed Per Mass of MOF (Average ± Standard Deviation) at 303 K (CO<sub>2</sub> Pressure 100 kPa) Calculated Using Resonant Frequency Change in Drop-Cast and LB Samples

| sample                        | average MOF mass (μg) | CO<sub>2</sub> adsorption (mmol of CO<sub>2</sub>/g of MOF) |
|-------------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------|
| Cast-film (MOF)                | 5.6                   | 1.58 ± 0.01                                                |
| Cast-film (MOF + 1% BA)        | 5.4                   | 0.94 ± 0.01                                                |
| LB film (MOF + 1% BA, 2 layers) | 2.3                   | 0.94 ± 0.02                                                |
| LB film (MOF + 1% BA, 1 layer)  | 1.2                   | 0.90 ± 0.05                                                |
